resources.string: Four of the best UK comedians including award winners and TV acts. New line-ups every week.
Doors 8:00pm, show 9:00pm. New 70 minute show format with Covid-safe measures.
SWG3 presents the diverse sounds of tech-house producer, Patrick Topping - 18+ only
Note: If you are disabled or have mobility issues, please read the FAQ section of the SWG3 website before purchasing tickets.

string-array.item: Rotunda Comedy Club | Thur, Nov 18 - 10:00 pm
SWG3 - Galvanizers Yard | Thur, Nov 11 - 8:00 pm

string-array.name: descriptions
string-array.item: Four of the best UK comedians including award winners and TV acts. New line-ups every week.
SWG3 presents the diverse sounds of tech-house producer, Patrick Topping - 18+ only

After an unforgettable three days of music in Glasgow Green, we’re delighted to announce the first artists on the line up for 2022’s event. Headlining will be Paolo Nutini, The Strokes and Lewis Capaldi, joined by The Snuts, Jimmy Eat World, Foals, Wolf Alice, Fontaines D.C., Sigrid and Beabadoobee from Friday 8th – Sunday 10th July 2022.
The best tribute bands in the business descend on Glasgow for a weekend of live music, With tributes to, Oasis, Blur, Stone Roses, Happy Mondays, James, Pulp The Smiths and Shed Seven
